Installing from sourceÂ¶

This code is developed on GitHub. If you received the code as a tarball or zip, skip to below the git clone line. I would recommending performing the below steps in a fresh conda environment.

python3 -m pip install -U pip
python3 -m pip install -U setuptools setuptools_scm pep517
git clone https://github.com/arjunsavel/covid-hacks-2020.git
cd covid-hacks-2020
pip install -r requirements.txt
